product_name: IT CosmeticsBye Bye Makeup 3-in-1 Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm
summary: SummaryMelt away your makeup instantly with this It Cosmetics Bye Bye Makeup 3-in-1 Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm that can also be used as your brightening cleanser and hydrating face mask!
details: DetailsFeaturesAs your makeup remover balm: When massaged into skin, this rich balm transforms into a nourishing oil that easily melts away even the most stubborn waterproof makeup and SPF without stripping or drying out your skin. In fact, it's now tested to deliver 24HR skin hydration!As your brightening facial cleanser: Add water, and the skin-loving formula with vitamin C and rosehip oil turns into a milky cleanser that helps to visibly brighten skin instantly and over time!As your hydrating face mask: Simply apply a scoop of the cleansing balm onto a clean face and leave on for 10 minutes to soak in the skin-softening benefits before rinsing or wiping off. For best results, repeat two to three times a week.BenefitsYour 3-in-1 long-wear makeup and sunscreen remover, brightening facial cleanser and hydrating face mask!Transforms from a rich balm to a nourishing oil when applied to skin, and to a milky cleanser when water is added.Tested to deliver 24HR hydration* so it won't leave skin feeling tight or dry.Vegan**, non-comedogenic and alcohol-free - won't dry skin or clog pores.Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.*Based on a corneometer test when used as a makeup remover balm. **Vegan formula: no animal-derived ingredients.Key IngredientsVitamin C: Known to even the complexion and bring radiance to the skin.Rosehip Oil: Known to help nourish and hydrate the skin.Ceramide: Known to play an important role in having a healthy skin barrier.Shea Butter: Known for its moisturizing properties.Item 2594127How To UseMorning or night, use clean fingers to scoop out a quarter-sized amount of cleansing balm and apply to dry skin.Use your fingertips to massage into your face for about 30 seconds, focusing on areas that have more makeup.Add water to emulsify and continue to massage.Rinse clean with water and pat skin dry.IngredientsEthylhexyl Palmitate, Polyethylene, Peg-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Phenoxyethanol, Peg-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil / Jojoba Seed Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol, Parfum / Fragrance, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Polysorbate 20, Ppg-26-Buteth-26, Ceramide Np, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Aqua/Water/Eau, Citric Acid.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Morning or night, use clean fingers to scoop out a quarter-sized amount of cleansing balm and apply to dry skin.Use your fingertips to massage into your face for about 30 seconds, focusing on areas that have more makeup.Add water to emulsify and continue to massage.Rinse clean with water and pat skin dry.
ingredients: Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil / Jojoba Seed Oil

reviews.headline: Great Choice for Me
reviews.comments: I have dry skin, and this goes on like silk, easily gliding on and no pulling or tugging! It takes off all my makeup, and isn't harsh on my sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Effective
reviews.comments:
This is effective at melting off makeup. it does require a little more work to rinse off than foaming cleansers, so you might use a little more water during rinsing. My skin feels very soft and smooth after using it. I don't feel that tightness that I get with most cleaners that will send me looking for my moisturizer as soon as my face dries. I really do like this a lot. I have picky sensitive skin and eyes, but absolutely no issues with this, even using to remove eye makeup. 
that all being said, man, it's pricy. There does seem to be a generous portion in the jar, though. It's the first balm I've tried, so I will definitely experiment with brands and compare performance with co$t.

reviews.headline: Love the product but the smell is horrible
reviews.comments: I used this product religiously for many years but they redid the formula when they rebranded the jar. The smell is so strong that I couldn't finish the jar. I don't know why they'd intensify the scent when most people are moving towards unscented products.

reviews.headline: It's A Great Product But Very Expensive
reviews.comments: I love this balm, but it is very expensive.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I love it !!!

reviews.headline: Not a pleasant smell
reviews.comments: I give this 2 stars because it works, but the smell will keep me from using it.

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: Yo nunca eh sufrido de acne pero con este desmaquillante se me broto la cara horrible PORFAVOR NO LO COMPRES

reviews.headline: Not effective
reviews.comments: I started using cleansing balms at the start of the year because I was tired of having to do a two-step process removing eye makeup with one product then cleansing again all over my face with something else. I looked for balms  to do both. I bought both the IT cleansing balm and the Clinique equivalent.  Clinique does the job perfectly and everything rinses clean. After cleansing thoroughly with the IT balm and paying particular attention to my eye makeup ( and i don't even use waterproof mascaras) i was left with horrible racoon eyes. I have to do a second round of cleaning with micellar water to clean it all up. Last time i'll purchase the IT balm. Clinique is my go-to now. Better price and value too when i got a BOGO. Rinses clean. Doesn't irritate my eyes either.

reviews.headline: I buy this product again  and again!
reviews.comments: This product is easy, effective  and my skin always feels clean.   I bought this initially because I wanted a simple cleanser when camping.  Now it's my go to!

reviews.headline: pricey
reviews.comments: this works great but so do others for much less money.

reviews.headline: I so wanted to love this, but causes me to breakout
reviews.comments: I have used many balms, and i wanted to love this but everytime i use this after 2 days i get acne! I had stopped using and used a competitor and it got better. Its like you have to make sure you double wash my face after (which defeats the purpose) i always double cleanse! First ingredient is not acne friendly.

reviews.headline: Great Stuff!
reviews.comments: I got this because I was looking for something new that lasted longer. I was researching cleansing balms and was leaning towards a very expensive alternative until I stumbled on this in-store. My former cleanser just never had enough in the bottle to last very long and I was spending way to much to replenish. I actually love this balm. I've been using it for about 2 weeks now. Melts the makeup right off. It isn't drying and my skin retains moisture. I was hesitant because my skin is very sensitive. No issues here. Smells like roses. Works great! I don't have to follow with any other products to remove residual makeup. It does what it's designed to do. I follow with Confidence in a Cream. I will buy it again.

reviews.headline: I got this and love it (not a fake review)
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this makeup remover. I went in to Ulta to buy a tarte lip plumper and swatched a few on my hand, and this is what they gave me to remove it. I loved it and asked where there was one for me to buy and bought it that day.

reviews.headline: Amazing balm but one downsideâ€¦
reviews.comments: I have used this cleansing balm in the past and may I say this removed everything and my skin was soft and supple. I recommend it but personally if it didnt have parfum in it i would repurchase again.

reviews.headline: Used to be 5 stars, downgraded to 1
reviews.comments:
I very rarely write reviews but this is important. Hands down this used to be the best skincare/makeup product I've ever found. 5 stars all day. Removes all my waterproof makeup effortlessly. 
They recently changed the formula and the scent now is nauseating and overpowering. Why "fix" what is not broken? Look at all these reviews complaining about this horrendous scent and make a change before we all find a new holy grail. I have 2 jars (1 just opened and 1 new) that I'm contemplating returning. IT Cosmetics get your stuff together and listen to your buyers!

reviews.headline: Wonderful makeup remover
reviews.comments: Great makeup remover- quick and clean

reviews.headline: Dries skin out
reviews.comments: I don't really like this.  It's too drying.

reviews.headline: a great find
reviews.comments: I usually use another brand's make up removing balm, but I thought I'd try this one since it was a great deal during Ulta's Skin event.  I like it so much that I was so excited when Ulta included it on their "last chance" day because I could buy another tub to save for later! It removes make up so well without drying. It has a rose smell which I kind of like. I would recommend this product 100% and I'm so happy that I have TWO tubs now =)

reviews.headline: RUNNNNNN
reviews.comments:
I had such high hopes for this product! I gave it a month, and it did not work for me. 

Does it remove makeup? Mostly yes. 
Does it leave a greasy residue? Also yes. 
Is it overpriced for its effectiveness? Heck yes.
Does that greasy residue cause acne breakouts? ALSO YES. 

I will be going back to my $8 micellar water or the $20 Purity facewash from Philosophy. Much better on my skin and does a better job, in my opinion.

reviews.headline: Sooo good!!
reviews.comments: This stuff gets everything off beautifully and feels seriously sooo good leaving my skin feeling super clean and HYDRATED. Idk about you but theres no worse feeling than washing your face and feeling sooo dried out. 10/10 recommend! On the plus side i got this for half off on the day i discovered it:) total win

media.headline: Say Bye Bye to Waterproof Mascara

faceoff_positive.comments: I was very skeptical of balm cleansers,  until this. I've tried other balm cleansers after using this one just to see if they worked as well. Some are better than others but this brand provides gentle cleansing,  melts away additional makeup and gives my skin hydration. It doesn't take much. I love how it feels on my face and am so impressed with the appearance of my face after my face is cleansed and dry. I have noticed maximum benefits with continued use.
faceoff_positive.headline: DOES WHAT IT SAYS

faceoff_negative.comments: I loved the former cleansing balm.  It was a great consistency, scent, and worked great.  It seems that all the products I loved from It Cosmetics have been reformulated, less effective, and even the packaging looks cheaper!  I do not care for rose scented body products and this is an awful scent.  I'm going to have to try a new brand because these new formulations are not effective nor do they have appealing scents.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not improved

rollup.name: Bye Bye Makeup 3-in-1 Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm
